fertilityAssessment.description: Answer a few questions to get insights about your fertility status and next steps to help you achieve your family-building goals.

step1.title: Fertility Health Self-Assessment
step1.description: Answer the questions honestly to understand your fertility readiness.
step1.question: I am completing this assessment as:

step2.description: Please answer all questions honestly for an accurate assessment.

female.regularCycles: Are your menstrual cycles regular (every 24–35 days)?
female.painfulPeriods: Do you experience painful periods or heavy bleeding?
female.diagnosedConditions: Have you ever been diagnosed with PCOS, thyroid issues, or endometriosis?
female.under35: Are you under 35 years of age?
female.tryingToConceive: Have you been trying to conceive for more than 12 months (or 6 months if over 35)?
female.unwantedSymptoms: Do you experience symptoms like unwanted facial hair, acne, or weight gain?
female.previousConditions: Have you had previous pelvic infections, surgeries, or miscarriages?

male.semenAnalysis: Have you ever had a semen analysis done?
male.knownIssues: Do you have any known issues like low sperm count or varicocele?
male.lifestyle: Do you smoke, drink excessively, or have a sedentary lifestyle?
male.surgeries: Have you had any surgeries or trauma in the groin area?
male.exposure: Are you exposed to high heat, radiation, or toxic substances at work?

both.intercourse: Do you have intercourse 2–3 times per week, timed around ovulation?
both.stress: Do you feel stressed or anxious about fertility or parenthood?
both.evaluated: Have you or your partner been evaluated for fertility before?

results.title: Your Fertility Assessment Score
results.lowRiskDescription: You seem to be on the right track. Stay healthy and monitor.
results.moderateRiskDescription: A basic fertility evaluation is recommended.
results.highRiskDescription: You should consult a fertility expert without delay.

contactForm.title: Want to discuss your results with our experts?
contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.contactConsent: I'd like a fertility specialist to contact me

hero.description: Since 2008, we've been dedicated to providing world-class fertility care with compassion, innovation, and a commitment to helping families grow.

doctor.title: Meet Dr. Ritu
doctor.paragraph1: With over 15 years of dedicated experience in reproductive medicine, Dr. Ritu has established herself as one of the leading fertility specialists in the country. Her journey in reproductive medicine began at prestigious institutions, where she honed her expertise in advanced fertility treatments.
doctor.paragraph2: Dr. Ritu's approach combines cutting-edge medical expertise with deep empathy for her patients. She has successfully helped thousands of couples achieve their dream of parenthood, earning recognition both nationally and internationally.
doctor.paragraph3: Beyond her clinical practice, Dr. Ritu is actively involved in research and has published numerous papers in renowned medical journals. She regularly speaks at international conferences, sharing her insights and contributing to the advancement of fertility treatments.

excellence.title: Excellence in Care
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in fertility treatment, constantly updating our methods with the latest advancements.

patientCentered.title: Patient-Centered Approach
patientCentered.description: Every treatment plan is personalized, considering each patient's unique circumstances and needs.

compassionate.title: Compassionate Support
compassionate.description: Our team provides emotional support throughout your journey, understanding the challenges of fertility treatment.

patientStory.title: A Journey of Hope
patientStory.subtitle: Real stories from our patients that inspire hope and determination
patientStory.quote: We got referred from Priyanka Yadav, my colleague in the bank. She told me about the behavior of Ritu ma'am and her experience. From the very first time since we met with ma'am, our experience was really very good. We were very happy with our experience with Dr. Ritu ma'am, and we will definitely advise other patients to start their beautiful journey of IVF with the most humblest and attentive doctor, Dr. Ritu Agarwal. Thank you so much ma'am.
patientStory.author: Lajwanti - Rishi Raj

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about fertility treatments at Ritu IVF. If you don't find your question here, please don't hesitate to contact us.

questions.question: Does Embryo Transfer Hurt?
questions.answer: No, embryo transfer is generally not painful during treatment. Most patients feel minimal discomfort. The procedure is typically done while the patient is awake, using a soft catheter that passes through the cervix to place the embryo in the uterus.

questions.question: How Many Visits Will Be Required To Complete IVF Treatment?
questions.answer: The number of visits required to complete IVF treatment can vary depending on individual circumstances, the protocol used by the fertility clinic, and the patient's response to treatment.

questions.question: Is IVF Treatment Safe?
questions.answer: IVF is a completely safe treatment as most people do not experience any health issues throughout the entire process.

questions.question: What Is The Average Success Rate Of IVF Treatment?
questions.answer: The average success rate of IVF treatment at Ritu IVF Center typically ranges from 80% to 95% per cycle, depending on various factors such as the woman's age, causes of infertility, and specific techniques used.

questions.question: How Long Does It Take To Get Pregnant With IVF Treatment?
questions.answer: The duration to conceive with IVF treatment varies, typically ranging from several weeks to a few months. This timeline includes initial consultations, pre-treatment preparations, the actual IVF cycle, and monitoring until pregnancy confirmation.

questions.question: Are IVF Babies Normal?
questions.answer: Yes, having babies through IVF is considered normal and is a common and effective solution for couples facing fertility issues.

questions.question: How Can I Book An Appointment With A Doctor At Ritu IVF Center?
questions.answer: You can book an online appointment with the doctor by filling out the contact form. For a quick response, you can call us at +91 9057000555.

questions.question: How Is Ritu IVF Different From Other Clinics?
questions.answer: At Ritu IVF, being 'Jaipur's Best IVF Center', we provide personalized care, cutting-edge technology, and compassionate support to help make your dream of parenthood come true.

faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? Our fertility specialists are ready to help.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our happy families
testimonials.description: Nothing showcases our success better than the families we've helped create. Read their inspiring stories.

stories.quote: I took IVF treatment from Dr Ritu Agarwal and got blessed with two twin daughters successfully. When all hopes of conceiving were lost, Dr Ritu Agarwal proved to be a blessing for me. She is very patient with her patients and makes every possible effort to succeed. Now I can say that I am her big fan and would really recommend her.
stories.author: Siddhika

stories.quote: First of all I want to say thank you that we are really grateful that Dr Ritu Agarwal has made our dreams come true. She is very helpful and really a good doctor I have ever met. She not only listens to everyone's issue very patiently and peacefully but also gives a personal touch to everyone.
stories.author: Abhishek Jyoti Mittal

stories.quote: We got referred from Priyanka Yadav, my colleague in the bank. She told me about the behavior of Ritu ma'am and her experience. From the very first time since we met with ma'am, our experience was really very good. We were very happy with our experience with Dr. Ritu ma'am.
stories.author: Lajwanti - Rishi Raj

stories.quote: It is actually not a difficult task to describe the journey of the arrival of 'Avaneesh'. It has been possible by the grace of god and the great efforts of ma'am Dr Ritu Agarwal. I remember the date 11/07/2021, when we first met ma'am. Her smile and confidence always supported us and cooperated in our goal.
stories.author: Priya and Abhi

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect
items: Detailed consultation with an IVF specialist (45-60 minutes)
Review of your medical history and previous fertility treatments
Discussion of treatment options tailored to your needs
Answers to questions and addressing concerns
Tour of our state-of-the-art facilities (for in-person visits)
